summary.para: Describes a memory range in a 64-bit address space.

remarks.para: End is one-past-the-end. When Begin equals End, the range is empty. The size of the range is (End - Begin).
This structure is used by the structure.

summary.para: The offset, in bytes, denoting the beginning of a memory range.
The offset, in bytes, denoting the end of a memory range. End is one-past-the-end.
